# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="c5654-102">Ustvarjanje e-poštnega podpisa v Outlooku v spletu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c5654-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c5654-103">pojdi k</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c5654-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="c5654-104">**Nastavitve**  >  **Ogled vseh Outlookovih nastavitev**  >  **Sestavite in odgovorite**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c5654-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c5654-105">V razdelku **e-poštni podpis**vnesite svoj podpis in uporabite možnosti oblikovanja, ki so na voljo za Spreminjanje videza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c5654-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c5654-106">*Opomba:* Lahko imate le en podpis na račun.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c5654-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c5654-107">Če želite izvedeti več, si oglejte [Ustvarjanje in dodajanje e-poštnega podpisa v Outlooku v spletu](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c5654-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
